code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt reports Body Aches from time to time. patient is a 67 YO m. he denies drinking alcohol Patient does not smoke o:Height 170 cm, Weight 54.1 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18, B burgdorferi IgG Serum positive a:Lyme Disease p:administered amoxicillin/calvulanate - 875 mg 2x day, performed B burgdorferi IgG Serum, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:pt says he is having symptoms of Body Aches 10 x week, in spite of treatment. pt is a male lighthouse keeper aged 69 yrs. denies any alcohol use Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 170 cm, Weight 53.1 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 14 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.
